content.raw: Also make sure to use 16x anistropic filtering where needed to improve texture rendering (see my material file on how to enable it). Surfaces that might be viewed at an angle (ground, walls, objects, ...) appear way too blurred otherwise which causes the texture to lose features and degrade perception algorithms.
content.html: Also make sure to use 16x anistropic filtering where needed to improve texture rendering (see my material file on how to enable it). Surfaces that might be viewed at an angle (ground, walls, objects, ...) appear way too blurred otherwise which causes the texture to lose features and degrade perception algorithms.
